doc.previous: An independent auditor measures the express delivery performance of all international EMS operators. EMS Performance Awards are based on postal operator's performance, including service performance and tracking. Gold, Silver, or Bronze certificate are awarded to EMS Cooperative members depending on their yearly performance.[3] These EMS award winners are recorded in the EMS Cooperative's Hall of Fame.[4]
doc.after: Since its creation, 177 postal administrations have joined the EMS Cooperative, representing over 85% of EMS operators worldwide.[5]
